summary: An assassin working for the CIA decides to take one final job before quiting only to find out that he is the target of his CIA boss.
cast: James Remar|Mario Van Peebles|Al Sapienza|Catherine Mary Stewart|Bruce Boxleitner|Dave Power|Andre Ware|John Prosky|Dominic Rains|Mike Grief|Lee Anthony|Shirley Saunders|McKinley Freeman|Stacey Hinnen|Lee Reherman|Kurt Meyer|Chris Muto|Jasmine Bejar|Jon Braver|Kaine Bennett Charleston|Victoria De Mare|Alyce Heath|Nick Hermz|Jim Palmer|Michael Ray Reed|Vin Vescio|Roy James Wilson
title: Liquidador
